Method Detail

getThreshold

public WPIBinaryImage getThreshold(int threshold)
Returns a black and white image where every pixel that is higher (in the 0-255 scale) than the given threshold is white, and everything below is black.

Parameters:
threshold - a value 0-255. if a pixel has a value below the theshold, it becomes black if the pixel value is above or equal to the threshold, the pixel becomes white
Returns:
a new WPIBinaryImage that represents the threshold

getThresholdInverted

public WPIBinaryImage getThresholdInverted(int threshold)
Returns a black and white image where every pixel that is higher (in the 0-255 scale) than the given threshold is black, and everything below is white. In other words, this will return the inverted image of getThreshold(...) but is more efficient than calling getThreshold(...).getInverse()

Parameters:
threshold - a value 0-255. if a pixel has a value below the theshold, it becomes black if the pixel value is above or equal to the threshold, the pixel becomes white
Returns:
a new WPIBinaryImage that represents the threshold
